description: Used to retrieve training metrics from SageMaker.

parameters.name: MetricQueries
parameters.description: Queries made to retrieve training metrics from SageMaker. (dict) --- Specifies a query to retrieve training metrics from SageMaker. MetricName (string) --- The name of the metric to retrieve. ResourceArn (string) --- The ARN of the SageMaker resource to retrieve metrics for. MetricStat (string) --- The metrics stat type of metrics to retrieve. Period (string) --- The time period of metrics to retrieve. XAxisType (string) --- The x-axis type of metrics to retrieve. Start (integer) --- The start time of metrics to retrieve. End (integer) --- The end time of metrics to retrieve.

nested_items.name: MetricQueryResults
nested_items.description: The results of a query to retrieve training metrics from SageMaker.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the metric query.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A message describing the status of the metric query.

nested_items.name: XAxisValues
nested_items.description: The values for the x-axis of the metrics.

nested_items.name: MetricValues
nested_items.description: The metric values retrieved by the query.
